articles.description: WhatsApp recently introduced many  features in the country for its users, the instant messaging platform is working on many new features. Here are some of them.
articles.content:
By: Tech Desk | New Delhi | 
Updated: June 10, 2020 10:29:50 am
Five upcoming WhatsApp features. (File Photo: Indian Express)With over 2 billion worldwide users, WhatsApp is one of the most popular… [+2617 chars]
